segments.text: I really want to take a nap . I feel very sleepy today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What ’ s the matter ? Didn ’ t you get enough sleep last night ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I fell asleep very late . It was almost two o ’ clock in the morning when I finally fell asleep .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you worried about something ? Why couldn ’ t you sleep ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You know how it is when you ’ re in a strange country . Everything is new , and you get tired and nervous sometimes . Then you worry about your family , about conditions back home , about your courses , about your money , about everything . I tried to fall asleep but I just had too much on my mind .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , take it easy . Things will look better tomorrow . Maybe you should try exercising or a hot bath to help you relax .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Anything is worth a try . But right now I really just want to find a quiet place to take a nap .
segments.speaker: S1
